wikipedia_page.main: John Peter Kane (born 15 December 1960) is an English former professional footballer who played as a central defender in the Football League for Orient. He also played non-league football in the Essex area for clubs including Rainham Town, Leytonstone & Ilford, Walthamstow Avenue and Redbridge Forest.

John Kane (born 8 June 1987) is a footballer who plays as a defender for Pollok.
